description:
Mishima Hitomi is http://anidb.net/ch93274 [Hina]`s classmate in middle school, a pushover who has trouble saying no to helping people. Her demeanor indirectly leads her to usurp http://anidb.net/ch93279 [Utako]`s position as the bartender at her own bar. Then, through a series of coincidences, she is mistaken as an adult and later becomes an influential member of society with connections to businesspeople, politicians, and the yakuza.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Mishima Hitomi
